Class SystemEnvironmentFixture

All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
PowerSearchSystemEnvironmentFixture
public class SystemEnvironmentFixture
extends fitlibrary.DoFixture

This is the FitNesse SetUp fixture invoked from FitNesse to set things like host, port, browser, timeout, base Url etc.

Author:
QAIT

initSelenium

private static void initSelenium(java.lang.String host,
                                 int port,
                                 java.lang.String browser,
                                 java.lang.String baseUrl)
Creates a new Selenium instance, starts a session, maximizes the current window and sets the default timeout

Parameters:
host - the host on which Selenium tests are to run
port - the port on which Selenium RC runs
browser - the browser on which to run the tests
baseUrl - the base Url for Selenium tests
